pageContext.claim: “I won every debate based on the polls. You know, they do polls -- seven or eight polls. Time Magazine -- Time Magazine's not a fan of mine. Drudge, Time Magazine they have seven polls. I don't think, I may be wrong -- I don't think you'll find one poll that I ever lost in any of the 14, 15 debates. Including the presidential debate, you know with her, the three.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump lost every debate with Clinton, according to high-quality scientific polls.
